resources.string: Lumina Blaze controls the power of light and fire, merging the two elements to create devastating attacks and blinding defenses.
Aqua Vortex commands the oceans and the water within them, manipulating tides and summoning massive waves at will.
Shadow Phantom moves silently through the night, blending with shadows to become nearly invisible.
Electra Surge wields the power of electricity, channeling it to unleash lightning bolts and create force fields.
Terra Titan has control over the earth, with the ability to cause earthquakes and reshape landscapes.
Phoenix Fury harnesses the power of fire and rebirth, rising from the ashes to protect the innocent and vanquish evil.
